item.title: The Lord Expects Righteousness
item.description:
The Lord Expects Righteousness by President Spencer W. Kimball, President of the Church given in the Saturday Morning session of the 152nd Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 1982
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
